title: Tibet: a personal report
creator_credit: Felix Greene, Elena Greene and Anne Greene
brief_description: Records the conditions of life in precommunist Tibet as well as the fascinating life and activities of the people today. Shows not only the towns but the vast wind swept grasslands, 16,000 feet above sea level, where many Tibetans still live as nomads.
creator_credit_for_label: Felix Greene, Elena Greene and Anne Greene
